hints.content:
This image shows $\blueE3$ rows with $\purpleD{5}$ in each row.

![Three rows of apples. The rows are numbered 1, 2, and 3. Row 1 has 5 apples. Row 2 has 5 apples. Row 3 has 5 apples. The apples are numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 at the top of the rows.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b3566c0a734e6cd7c8b229bdf2bc8cd0d561d06e)

This image represents $5 + 5 + 5$:

![Three rows of apples. Row 1 has 5 apples. Row 2 has 5 apples. Row 3 has 5 apples.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cf02199e28b64b6f7f98b5eff80b5e165a46e06f)

choices.content: ![Two rows of apples. Row 1 has 5 apples. Row 2 has 5 apples.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ef41eff622bdea8e2f993c4d41e385b12199c599)
![Three rows of apples. Row 1 has 4 apples. Row 2 has 4 apples. Row 3 has 4 apples.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d50c93d957865949c540b591654233fa81228a51)
![Three rows of apples. Row 1 has 5 apples. Row 2 has 5 apples. Row 3 has 5 apples.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a25edda9160aab33327a49545e04e01cce743a23)
